item.description:
The ancients knew that the winter solstice was the longest night of the year - and that meant that the sun was beginning its long journey back towards earth. It is a time of celebration, and for rejoicing in the knowledge that soon, the warm days of spring will return, and the dormant earth comes back to life. On this one day, the sun stands still in the sky, and everyone on earth knows that change is coming. Join us in a ritual to celebrate the return of the Sun!

We will have our annual Yankee swap, as always the rules are simple: Your gift must be handmade and homemade. Potluck snacks are also encouraged.

Wear your finest Yule attire and plan on being on time.

There will be no class this evening.
item.name: Coven Yule Celebration/Circle
